title: According to a recent poll by the Pew Internet Project, girls between the ages of $$14$$ and $$17$$ send an average of $$187$$ text messages each day. Let X $$=$$ the number of texts that a girl aged $$14$$ to $$17$$ sends per day. The discrete random variable X takes on the values $$x$$ $$=$$ $$0$$, $$1$$, $$2$$ …. The random variable X has a Poisson distribution: X ~ P(187). The mean is $$187$$ text messages.
